017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.Common.parseNameAndEmail;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
023
024import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
025import java.util.EnumSet;
026import java.util.List;
027import java.util.Set;
028
029import org.apiguardian.api.API;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
031import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
032import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet;
033
034/**
035 *  This taglet is used to refer to the author of the modifications to a piece
036 *  of code that was originally written by somebody else (named in the
037 *  {@code @author} or the
038 *  {@link AuthorTaglet @extauthor}
039 *  tag. It requires that reference to the editor in the format below:
040 *  <pre><code>  &#x40;modified &lt;<i>name</i>&gt; <b>-</b> &lt;<i>email address</i>&gt;</code></pre>
041 *  Basically, this is the name of the editor, followed by their email address,
042 *  separated by a hyphen (&quot;&#x2d;&quot; &amp;#x2d), surrounded by
043 *  blanks.<br>
044 *  <br>If there is no email address, just the name will be shown in the
045 *  output.
046 *
047 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
048 *  @version $Id: ModifiedTaglet.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $
049 *  @since 0.0.5
050 *
051 *  @UMLGraph.link
052 */
053@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ModifiedTaglet.java 820 2020-12-29 20:34:22Z tquadrat $" )
054@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
055public final class ModifiedTaglet implements Taglet
056{
057        /*-----------*\
058    ====** Constants **========================================================
059        \*-----------*/
060    /**
061     *  The name of this taglet: {@value}.
062     */
063    public static final String TAGLET_NAME = "modified";
064
065        /*--------------*\
066    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
067        \*--------------*/
068    /**
069     *  Creates a new {@code ModifiedTaglet} instance.
070     */
071    @SuppressWarnings( "RedundantNoArgConstructor" )
072    public ModifiedTaglet() { /* Just exists */ }
073
074        /*---------*\
075    ====** Methods **==========================================================
076        \*---------*/
077    /**
078     *  {@inheritDoc}
079     */
080    @Override
081    public final Set<Location> getAllowedLocations() { return EnumSet.allOf( Location.class ); }
082
083    /**
084     *  {@inheritDoc}
085     */
086    @Override
087    public final String getName() { return TAGLET_NAME; }
088
089    /**
090     *  {@inheritDoc}
091     */
092    @Override
093    public final boolean isInlineTag() { return false; }
094
095    /**
096     *  {@inheritDoc}
097     */
098    @Override
099    public final String toString( final List<? extends DocTree> tags, final Element element )
100    {
101        final var template =
102            """
103            
104            <dt><span class="simpleTagLabel">Modified by:</span></dt>
105              <dd>%s</dd>
106            """;
107        final var retValue = format( template, parseNameAndEmail( this, tags ) );
108
109        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
110        return retValue;
111    }   //  toString()
112}
113//  class ModifiedTaglet
114
115/*
116 *  End of File
117 */
